parts: please generate a line graph comparing a fixed solar ppa rate with an increasing utility rate.  please assume 2 percent increase

content.text: {"prompt":"Create a line graph comparing a fixed Solar Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) rate with an increasing utility rate over a 20-year period. The X-axis should represent the years from 1 to 20, and the Y-axis should represent the cost in cents per kWh. Assume the fixed Solar PPA rate is set at 10 cents per kWh throughout the period. For the increasing utility rate, start at 10 cents per kWh and increase it by 2 percent annually. Label the Solar PPA line and the increasing utility rate line for clarity. Include a legend to identify each line, and ensure the graph is well-organized and easy to understand.","size":"1024x1024"}

dalle.prompt: Create a line graph comparing a fixed Solar Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) rate with an increasing utility rate over a 20-year period. The X-axis should represent the years from 1 to 20, and the Y-axis should represent the cost in cents per kWh. Assume the fixed Solar PPA rate is set at 10 cents per kWh throughout the period. For the increasing utility rate, start at 10 cents per kWh and increase it by 2 percent annually. Label the Solar PPA line and the increasing utility rate line for clarity. Include a legend to identify each line, and ensure the graph is well-organized and easy to understand.

Create a line graph comparing a fixed Solar Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) rate with an increasing utility rate over a 20-year period. The X-axis should represent the years from 1 to 20, and the Y-axis should represent the cost in cents per kWh. Assume the fixed Solar PPA rate is set at 10 cents per kWh throughout the period. For the increasing utility rate, start at 10 cents per kWh and increase it by 2 percent annually. Label the Solar PPA line and the increasing utility rate line for clarity. Include a legend to identify each line, and ensure the graph is well-organized and easy to understand.

parts: DALLÂ·E displayed 2 images. The images are already plainly visible, so don't repeat the descriptions in detail. Do not list download links as they are available in the ChatGPT UI already. The user may download the images by clicking on them, but do not mention anything about downloading to the user.

Here are the line graphs comparing a fixed Solar PPA rate with an increasing utility rate over a 20-year period. Each graph displays the cost in cents per kWh on the Y-axis against the years from 1 to 20 on the X-axis. You can observe the fixed Solar PPA rate at 10 cents per kWh throughout the period, and the increasing utility rate starting at 10 cents per kWh with a 2 percent annual increase.
